wikipedia_page.main: Samuel Seth Ashton (born 9 October 1986) is an English footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for English non-League side Macclesfield. He has previously played for Bolton Wanderers, FC United of Manchester, Skelmersdale United, Southport, Chorley, Ramsbottom United and Radcliffe.

response: He joined FC United of Manchester on a short-term loan in February 2008 after an injury to their regular first-team goalkeeper Sam Ashton ruled him out for a few weeks.
